entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 8.
